question: A portal has been launched for the sale of items under AFD-1 category, related to which Ministry?
option4: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers welfare
explanation:
Defence Minister Rajnath Singh launched a portal for the online sale of items falling under AFD-I category, through the Canteen Stores Department (CSD).
Against Firm Demand (AFD-I) category has expensive items including washing machines, microwave ovens, refrigerators, air-conditioners, mobile phones among others. Through this portal, lakhs of armed forces personnel and ex-servicemen can purchase the items from home.
